item.title: UN says worker killed in Gaza as Israeli air strikes resume
item.description: Israel's military denies attacking the Deir al-Balah compound, after the Hamas-run health ministry blamed an Israeli strike.

item.title: Malaysia green-lights new MH370 search in Indian Ocean
item.description: Malaysia's cabinet approves a fresh search for the missing plane by exploration firm Ocean Infinity.

item.title: Erdogan rival arrested days before becoming presidential candidate
item.description: Ekrem Imamoglu's detention comes days before he was due to be selected as a presidential candidate.

item.title: Rosenberg: Trump-Putin call seen as victory in Russia
item.description: The Russian leader was able to set his own conditions for peace in a two-hour phone call with Donald Trump.

item.title: Colombian police arrest Italian fugitive accused of being mafia boss
item.description: Police have described Emanuele Gregorini as "the head of the Italian mafia Latin America".
